title: Med3DVLM: An Efficient Vision-Language Model for 3D Medical Image Analysis
details: Y Xin, GC Ates, K Gong, W Shao - arXiv preprint arXiv:2503.20047, 2025
abstract: Vision-language models (VLMs) have shown promise in 2D medical image analysis, but extending them to 3D remains challenging due to the high computational demands of volumetric data and the difficulty of aligning 3D spatial features with …
